text: dhruqvO#&si dhruqvO#&ha(gm) sa#jAqtEShu# BUyAsaqM dhIraqScEttA# vasuqvid dhruqvO#&si dhruqvO#&ha(gm) sa#jAqtEShu# BUyAsamuqgraScEttA# vasuqvid dhruqvO#&si dhruqvO#&ha(gm) sa#jAqtEShu# BUyAsamaBiqBUScEttA# vasuqvidA ma#namaqsyAma#nasya dEvAq yE sa#jAqtAH ku#mAqrAH sama#nasaqstAnaqhaM kA#mayE hRuqdA tE mAM kA#mayantA(gm) hRuqdA tAn maq Ama#nasaH kRudhiq svAhA &&ma#namaqsyA - [  ]  35
